definition: master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]

sentences.chinese: 以我的汽車修理師爲例吧。

sentences.english: Zhigung Celestial Burial Ground has masters who are monks with Zhigungti Monastery of the Garyu Sect.
sentences.chinese: 直貢天葬場有來自噶舉派直貢替寺的喇嘛天葬師。

sentences.english: Not very young, the hope that they can learn more teachers, more personal style.
sentences.chinese: 不太年輕時候，希望自己能多學名師，多些個人風格。

sentences.english: That naughty little boy has grown into an outstanding bridge engineer.
sentences.chinese: 那個調皮的小男孩已成長爲一名傑出的橋樑一程師。

sentences.english: Ji Shengzi was celebrated for training fighting cock.
sentences.chinese: 紀渻子是有名的鬥雞訓練師。

sentences.english: Is an enchanter necessary to give magic properties to an item?
sentences.chinese: 幻術師是否可以給物品添加魔法屬性？

sentences.english: And he judged Israel twenty years.
sentences.chinese: 參孫作以色列的士師二十年。

sentences.english: It has taken the sculptor three weeks to do the head…
sentences.chinese: 製作師一般花三個星期製作蠟像的頭部。

sentences.english: When he was 15, and was working in a Church as an assistance organist, Ludwig was practically supporting the family.
sentences.chinese: 貝多芬15歲時就在教堂擔任助理風琴師，掙錢養家。

sentences.english: Wesley and Laura are computer programmers.
sentences.chinese: 韋斯利和勞拉是電腦程序師。

sentences.english: The Toolmaker is responsible for ensuring an efficient production while producing quality products.
sentences.chinese: 模具師應該在保證產品質量的情況下確保生產效率。

sentences.english: He is also among the first Japanese Sake Sommeliers in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 陳銘基先生同時是香港首批日本清酒品酒師。

sentences.english: A berserker wizard gets no score for treasure.
sentences.chinese: 一個狂暴的巫術師得不到珍貴的記號。

sentences.english: How was the Roman Empire cut in half?
sentences.chinese: 羅馬帝國師如何一分爲二的？

sentences.english: When they had finished he went round to the organist to make inquiries.
sentences.chinese: 試唱一結束，他就走過去向風琴師請教。

definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
